DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect Medical Yoga group treatment , conventional treatment provide physical therapist , people perceive stress-related symptom . Forty people randomize either : 1 . Intervention Group - Medical Yoga , group treatment eight week , 60 minute per week , guidance physical therapist . 2 . Control - treatment usual ( TAU ) physical therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Medical Yoga Patients With Stress-related Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Perceived stress anxiety , could express example tension neck shoulder , insomnia , anxiety headache . Do understand Swedish ( group instruction need understood ) , Pregnancy , Psychotic symptom , Ongoing physical therapy treatment last three month , Previously participate Medical Yoga group .
